Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 35th/Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 35th/Archer.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
